gpt_comment: ⚠️[DIVERGENT]: Meteoblue data differs from the baseline. Meteoblue states rain amount as 0.1-0.2", while baseline has 48% rain probability, but the amount is not stated. A rainy day in Brussels, perfect for indoor activities, maybe a museum visit?
